title: Buckwheat Blinis with Smoked Salmon
ingredients: ['235ml warm milk', '1/2 teaspoon dried active baking yeast', '1/2 teaspoon sugar', '60g buckwheat flour', '2 eggs, beaten', '2 tablespoons soured cream', '60ml cream', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '90g flour', 'vegetable oil frying', 'Topping', '2 slices smoked salmon', 'soured cream to garnish', 'chopped fresh dill to garnish']
